thread.title: M Jayakumar is all praise for Achal Udayan
thread.title_full: M Jayakumar is all praise for Achal Udayan - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: M Jayakumar is all praise for Achal Udayan
text:
Young talent Achal Udayan has impressed the multitalented M Jayakumar.
The singer and composer uploaded a video of his latest song Ente Chundilee for the film Saigal Padukayanu, sung by Achal. He had posted on a social networking platform by saying, "Achal Udayan is a prodigy and he proves it with my song for Saigal padukayanu ..It is the very last song programmed by Kannan Sooraj Balan for me...The song is a very special one straight from my heart."
Saigal Padukayanu has Shine Tom Chacko and Remya Nambeesan, playing prominent roles.
